Home.title: Secure Ballot
Home.description: A blockchain based voting system that ensures secure and transparent elections.
Home.how_description: Voting in the decentralized system is easy and secure. Follow the steps below to cast your vote.
Home.step1_description: Click on 'Start Voting' to access the voting portal.
Home.step2_description: Verify your identity by filling in your details and submitting your voter ID.
Home.step3_description: Select your preferred candidate and submit your vote.
Home.FAQ_description: Have questions about the voting process? Check out our FAQs below.
Home.faq1_title: How do I know my vote is secure?
Home.faq1_description: The blockchain technology ensures that your vote is secure and cannot be tampered with.
Home.faq2_title: How do I know my vote is anonymous?
Home.faq2_description: The blockchain technology ensures that your vote is anonymous and cannot be traced back to you.
Home.faq3_title: Can I change my vote after submitting?
Home.faq3_description: No, once you submit your vote, it is final and cannot be changed.
Home.faq4_title: How is my identity verified in the decentralized system?
Home.faq4_description: Your identity is verified using your voter ID and personal details.
